caption.title:
Yearly R
hv estimates based on 'best-' and 'worst-'case scenarios from January 1996 to December 2015 in each of the 11 UCLs.
caption.p: (A) Best-case scenario with Aedes aegypti; (B) Worst-case scenario with Aedes aegypti; (C) Best-case scenario with Aedes albopictus; (D) Worst-case scenario with Aedes albopictus.
